name: AllentownCityGuide
0:
”Alexa, open Allentown Guide and tell me where can I get something to eat.”
”What are the top five things to do in Allentown?”
”Tell me about someone famous from Allentown.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: allentown guide
des:
A guide to Allentown, Pennsylvania; providing an overview and history of the city, as well as places to visit. This skill can help you get around town to see what is worth seeing, and where you can stop to relax or grab a bite to eat.

Plan a day out by learning about what attractions there are within Allentown:
 • What are the top five things to do in Allentown?
 • Where can we get something to eat?
 • How is the weather looking for today?

Learn about the history of the town and the American Civil War that so many know the town for today:
 • Tell me something interesting about Allentown.
 • Tell me about someone famous from Allentown.
